title: Bardiya Wilderness Experience - 4 Days
description: Experience Nepal's best kept wildlife secret in Bardiya National Park. Enjoy thrilling jungle safaris, spot Royal Bengal tigers, one-horned rhinos, and diverse wildlife in their natural habitat.

activities.name: Jungle Safari
activities.description: Experience wildlife safaris in pristine jungle

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bardiya
itinerary.description: Arrive in Bardiya National Park area. Check into jungle lodge. Evening Tharu cultural program with traditional dance and local dinner. Briefing about jungle activities.

itinerary.title: Full Day Jungle Safari
itinerary.description: Early morning jeep safari in search of tigers and rhinos. Return for breakfast. Afternoon elephant safari or walking safari. Evening boat safari on Karnali River for wildlife and bird watching.

itinerary.title: Wildlife Activities
itinerary.description: Morning bird watching and nature walk. Visit Tharu village and experience local lifestyle. Afternoon jungle safari with different route. Evening leisure time by the river.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning final safari activity. Return to lodge for breakfast and checkout. Transfer to departure point with wonderful wildlife memories.

fitness_requirements: Basic fitness required for walking safaris.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
